title: A Summer Day
author: Public Domain
body: The golden sun, the lazy breeze, the meadow hums with bees.

title: Evening by the Lake
author: Public Domain
body: Soft ripples kiss the shore, shadows lengthen, and the swallows soar.

title: Midsummer Night
author: Public Domain
body: Fireflies stitch the dusk with light; the world exhales into the night.
